text: Norman Cook (born Quentin Leo CookAdrian Room, Dictionary of Pseudonyms: 13,000 Assumed Names and Their Origins, 5th edition (Jefferson NC: McFarland & Co., Publishers, 2010), p. 172 on 16 July 1963), known by his stage name Fatboy Slim, is an English musician, disc jockey, rapper, and record producer.All Music Guide to Rock: The Definitive Guide to Rock, Pop, and Soul, eds. Vladimir Bogdanov; Chris Woodstra; Stephen Thomas Erlewine (San Francisco, CA: Backbeat Books, 2002), p. 397 He is known for songs like "Weapon of Choice", "The Rockafeller Skank", "Praise You", "Eat Sleep Rave Repeat", and "Right Here Right Now". Cook was born in Bromley, Kent. He was raised in Reigate, Surrey. He married Zoe Ball in 1999. The couple have a son and daughter. They separated in 2016. == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:British DJs Category:British rappers Category:Musicians from Kent Category:Musicians from Surrey Category:People from Bromley
title: Norman Cook
